Verses: 1 agasiyaavin Thaayaagiya Aththaaliyaal Than Kumaaran Irandhuponadhaik Kandapodhu, Ezhumbi Raajavamsasthar Yaavaraiyum Sangaaram Panninaal.

2 yoraam Ennum Raajaavin Kumaaraththiyum Agasiyaavin Sagodhariyumaagiya Yosebaal, Kolaiyunnappadugira Raajakumaararin Naduvilirukkira Agasiyaavin Maganaagiya Yovaasaik Kalavaai Eduththaal; Avan Kollappadaadhapadi, Avanaiyum Avan Thaadhiyaiyum Aththaaliyaalukkuth Theriyaamal Palli Araiyil Oliththu Vaiththaargal.
3 ivalodekooda Avan Aaruvarusham Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Oliththuvaikkappattirundhaan; Aththaaliyaal Dhesaththinmel Raajyabaarampanninaal.

4 ezhaam Varushaththile Yoidhaa Nooruperukku Adhipadhigalaiyum Thalaivaraiyum Kaavalaalaraiyum Azhaippiththu, Avargalaith Thannidaththil Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Varachcholli, Avargalodu Udanpadikkaipanni, Avargalaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Aanaiyiduviththuk Kondu, Avargalukku Raajaavin Kumaaranaik Kaanbiththu,
5 avargalai Nokki: Neengal Seyyavendiya Kaariyam Ennavendraal, Oivunaalil Muraippadi Inge Varugira Ungalil Moondril Orupangu Raajaavin Aramanaik Kaaval Kaakkavendum.
6 moondril Orupangu Soor Ennum Vaasalilum, Moondril Orupangu Kaavalaalarin Kaavalin Pirage Irukkira Vaasalilumirundhu Aalayakkaavalaip Paththiramaaik Kaakkavendum.
7 ippadiye Oivunaalil Muraippadiye Ungalil Irandupanguper, Raajaavinidaththil Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaik Kaaval Kaakkavendum.

8 neengal Avaravar Thangal Aayudhangalaik Kaiyile Pidiththavargalaai, Raajaavai Sutrilum Varisaiyaai Nindru Kondirukkavendum; Varisaigalukkul Pugundhuvarugiravan; Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan; Raajaa Veliye Pogumpodhum Ulle Varumpodhum Neengal Avarode Irungal Endraan.

9 aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaa Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Nooruperukku Adhipadhigal Seydhu, Avaravar Oivunaalil Muraippadi Varugiravargalum Muraippadi Pogiravargalumaagiya Thangal Manusharaik Koottikkondu, Aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaavinidaththil Vandhaargal.
10 aasaariyan Karththarin Aalayaththil Dhaaveedhuraajaa Vaiththirundha Eettigalaiyum Kedagangalaiyum Nooruperukku Adhipadhigalidaththil Koduththaan.

11 kaavalaalar Avaravar Thangal Aayudhangalaip Pidiththavargalaai, Aalayaththin Valadhupakkamthodangi Adhin Idadhupakkamattum, Balipeedaththirku Edhiraagavum Aalayaththirku Edhiraagavum Raajaavai Sutrilum Nindraargal.

12 appozhudhu Avan: Raajakumaaranai Veliye Konduvandhu, Kreedaththai Avanmel Vaiththu, Saatchiyin Aagamaththai Avan Kaiyile Koduththaan; Ippadi Avanai Raajaavaakki Abishegampanni: Raajaa Vaazhga Endru Solli Kaikottinaargal.
13 odivarugira Janangal Seydha Aaravaaraththai Aththaaliyaal Kettapodhu: Aval Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirku Janangalidaththil Vandhu,

14 idho, Raajaa Muraimaiyinpadiye Thoonandaiyile Nirkiradhaiyum, Raajaavandaiyil Nirkira Prabukkalaiyum, Ekkaalam Oodhugiravargalaiyum, Dhesaththu Janangal Ellaarum Sandhoshappattu Ekkaalam Oodhugiradhaiyum Kandavudane, Aththaaliyaal Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu: Dhrogam Dhrogam Endru Koovinaal.

15 aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaa Raanuvaththalaivaraagiya Nooruperukku Adhipadhigalaanavargalukkuk Kattalaiyittu: Ivalai Varisaigalukkup Purambe Kondupongal; Ivalaip Pinpatrugiravanaip Pattayaththaale Vettippodungal Endraan. Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Avalaik Kollalaagaadhu Endru Aasaariyan Solliyirundhaan.
16 avargal Avalukku Idam Undaakkinapodhu, Raajaavin Aramanaikkul Kudhiraigal Pravesikkira Vazhiyile Aval Pogaiyil, Avalaik Kondru Pottaargal.
17 appozhudhu Yoidhaa, Avargal Karththarudaiya Janamaayirukkumpadikku, Raajaavum Janangalum Karththarode Udanpadikkaipannavum, Raajaavum Janangalum Oruvarodoruvar Udanpadikkaipannavum Seydhu,

18 pinbu Dhesaththin Janangal Ellaarum Paagaalin Kovilil Poi, Adhai Idiththu, Adhin Balipeedangalaiyum Adhin Vikkiragangalaiyum Mutrilum Udaiththu, Paagaalin Poojaasaariyaagiya Maaththaanai Balipeedangalukku Munbaagak Kondru Pottaargal. Aasaariyan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththai Visaarikkum Uththiyogastharai Erpaduththinaan.

19 nooruperukku Adhipadhigalaiyum Thalaivaraiyum Kaavalaalaraiyum Dhesaththin Janangalaiyum Kootti, Raajaavaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththilirundhu Irangap Panni, Avanaik Kaavalaalarin Vaasal Vazhiyaai Raaja Aramanaikku Azhaiththukkonduponaargal; Ange Avan Raajaakkaludaiya Singaasanaththinmel Utkaarndhaan.
20 dhesaththin Janangal Ellaarum Magizhndhu Nagaram Amaidhalaayitru. Aththaaliyaalaiyo Raajaavin Aramanaiyandaiyil Pattayaththaal Kondrupottaargal.
21 yovaas Raajaavaagirapodhu Ezhu Vayadhaayirundhaan.
